headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS ION GAUGE CONTROLLER
description: Ion Gauge Controller    Granville Phillips Model 360, can replace 307 controller.   Picture of the controller's back panel is representative
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 360
Description Single Ion Gauge Controller, can be upgraded to dual for sequential ion gauge operation (add $50)
Gauge Types Controlled Ion
Cables Included No
Accessories
  • Cable between controller and the power supply included.
  • Does NOT have remote I/O connectors on the electrometer and power modules

Please inquire about availabiltiy of the cables, gauges and serial communication board.

Other Information

This controller can be calibrated for different ion gauges, calibration for each channel is loaded via memory modules.

  • If you have standard Bayard-Alpert glass gauge, CBI can upload average calibration for that gauge with sensitivity 10/Torr to channel one, two or both.
  • If you have Stabil-Ion gauge with individual module containing calibration for that gauge, you should upload that to the controller before using it.
  • If you have Stabil-Ion gauge without individual module, CBI can upload average calibration with sensitivity 50/Torr to channel one, two or both.

Specify type and sensitivity of your gauges when ordering.
Click here for the manual

Power Requirements 115 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 8.000 in (20.3 cm)
Depth 11.000 in (27.9 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 12 lb (5 kg)
